# Working with databases for functional enrichment




## MSigDB database

The [Molecular Signatures Database](https://www.gsea-msigdb.org/gsea/msigdb/) (MSigDB) database provide curated gene sets for different applications. It is organized in 9 major collections.




There is a number of functions provided by the [msigdbr](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/msigdbr/vignettes/msigdbr-intro.html) package which are implemented and supplemented by the pOmics package.

__msigdbr__

* `msigdbr()`: Retrieve gene sets
* `msigdbr_species()`: View available species
* `msigdbr_collections()`: View available collections
